subject: Amendment to Schedule H of Standard EPC Agreement for National Highways and Centrally Sponsored Road works proposed to be implemented on Engineering Procurement and Construction (EPC) mode of Contract and Annexure-l of Schedule G of Model Concession Agreement of Hybrid Annuity Project-reg.
text: HRa 74y rTHRf 9ferasrot (TTeq 4Rdev # rTTHNf #A, 4Ra RRGFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) at T vil-5 Qd 6, #d7-10, ETq, 7f fevlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TMN /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/2o23 Policy Circular No.11.45/ 2023 dated January, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/EPC/2O2O-Part(1) (Comp. No. 154678)} Sub.: Amendment to Schedule H of Standard EPC Agreement for National Highways and Centrally Sponsored Road works proposed to be implemented on Engineering Procurement and Construction (EPC) mode of Contract and Annexure-l of Schedule G of Model Concession Agreement of Hybrid Annuity Project- reg: Ministry of Road, Transport & Highways (MoRTH) vide Circular No.RW/NH-33044/88/2021- SGR(P&B) /DNT(215840) dated 19.12.2022 issued amendment to Schedule H of Standard EPC Agreement dated 05.03.2019. NHAI vide Policy Circular No.11.44/2022 dated 23.12.2022 implemented the same 2 MoRTH vide Circular No_ RWINH-33044/88/2021-SGR(PGB) / DNT(215840) dated 28.12.2022 has stated that keeping in view of the relaxation given by Government of India under "Atmanirbhar Bharat' the provisions of the aforesaid circular dated 19.12.2022 shall also be made applicable to schedule H of the ongoing projects being implemented on EPC mode of contract upto 31.03.2023_ 3 MoRTH has further stated that to allow the similar facility in HAM Concession Agreement (CA), a sub-stage has been introduced in Annexure-I of Schedule G of HAM CA for calculation of progress against casting of precast items such as bridge girders and RE-wall facia panels/blocks for determining achievement of project milestones. In view of this, MoRTH vide Circular dated 28.12.2022 has made amendments in Annexure-| of Schedule G of HAM CA as shown in the last column of the respective tables in Annexure. MoRTH has further stated that the amendments shall be made applicable to ongoing HAM concession agreements upto 31.03.2023. 4. It has been decided to follow the   provisions   of the aforesaid MoRTH Circular dated 28.12.2022 for NHAI works. A copy of the same is attached at Annexure 1 for implementation by all concerned. 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
